root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 4-b-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 4. Ensure equitable, inclusive and quality education and lifelong learning opportunities for all4.b By 2020, globally significantly increase the number of scholarships available to students from developing countries, in particular least developed countries, small island developing States and developing countries. '' Africa, to enable them to pursue higher education, including vocational training, computer, technical and scientific courses and engineering studies, in developed and other developing countries4.b.1.Volume of official development assistance devoted to scholarships, by sector and type of trainingThis is the total amount of official development assistance allocated to scholarshipsTotal amount of official development assistance allocated to scholarshipsNot available
